_comment: Add this to your openclaw.json under 'compaction'

compaction.memoryFlush:
IMPORTANT: Context is nearing compaction. You MUST preserve important information before it is lost.

Step 1: Run the observer in flush mode (captures last 2 hours, skips dedup):
exec: bash ~/clawd/scripts/observer.sh --flush

Step 2: Regardless of whether the observer succeeded, write a brief summary of THIS session key facts to memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md. Include decisions made, tasks completed or in progress, commitments or follow-ups, and any facts the user would expect you to remember.

Keep notes concise (bullet points). Reply with NO_REPLY after writing.
